LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.tabsOnTop.Descript: If checked, the bar with the main tabs and the clock will be on top, instead of on the bottom.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.togglersOnTop.Desc: If checked, the bar with the togglers for in-game view settings will be on top, instead of on the bottom.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.barOnRight: Extended bar on the right side
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.barOnRight.Descrip: If checked, the bar with the clima and date widgets will be on the right side, instead of on the left.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.designationsOnLeft: Designator bar on the left side
If checked, the new designator bar will be on the left.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaArchitect.D: This will disable the new Architect Menu.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaAnimals: Use vanilla Animals and Wildlife buttons
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaAnimals.Des: This will disable the new position of the Animals and Wildlife buttons.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.useDesignatorBar.D: This will enable the new Designator bar. This bar in very configurable and shows a list of designation job orders on screen.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Playsetting.altinspect.too: Toggle the Alt Inspector.\n\nWhen the Alt Inspector is active, the cell info in the bottom left will disappear. This info will now appear as a tooltip near the mouse while the "Alt" key is pressed.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.forceCustomTab.Des: Some mods may add tabs with custom behaviours. This mod overwrite those behaviours in order to make the tabs customizable. If you prefer those custom behaviours instead of the customization, untick this option. This option will take effect after resetting the game.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaReadout.Des: If checked, the readout of information of the tile the mouse is over will appear on the bottom-left corner of the screen. With this option unchecked, you should only rely on the alt-inspector.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaControlSpee: If checked, it will show the time speed controls on the vanilla place.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaDate.Descri: If checked, it will show the date information on the vanilla place.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaRealtime.De: If checked, it will show the Real Time Clock on the vanilla place.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaWeather.Des: If checked, it will show the weather information on the vanilla place.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.vanillaTemperature: If checked, it will show the temperature information on the vanilla place.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.legacyAltInspector: If this option is enabled, the Alt Inspector will use it's legacy mode to show the info in a tooltip.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Alerts.SettingsChecked.Des: UINotIncluded is all about customization. The default configuration it will probably not fill your needs.\n\nPlease, check the mod settings and configure the mod.
LanguageData.UINotIncluded.Setting.centeredWindows.De: Most windows will now be centered on the middle of the screen, or in the middle-left.
